JOURNAL.ThemeTooltip: Click to open the Theme and Font selector
JOURNAL.title: Theme Selector
JOURNAL.SelectYourTheme: Select a Journal Theme, Header Font, and Body Font

SETTING.MinOwnership: Set minimum ownership level to allow users to set their own theme
SETTING.MinOwnershipHint: When a user opens a Journal, they’ll see an extra button in the top header to set their own theme and fonts. This will affect only that user.

MENU.ThemeConfig: Set default theme and fonts for all new Journals
MENU.ThemeConfigHint: These settings will apply to all Journals where users haven’t changed the theme.
MENU.ownFontsHint: You can add your own fonts from Google Fonts or local files.

OWNFONT.addedFonts: Here you can load your own fonts, either from local files or Google Fonts.
OWNFONT.title: Add Your Own Fonts
